text: Jisas anɨb agek, bɨne ogɨnap kɨli ke nep agɨlak, Takaw chɨnop agup ak jɨj anɨb ak tay agɨlak? Ne agup, Sɨkol won olap mɨdɨl, yɨp ma yɨbɨl nɨgɨnɨgebɨm pen, kɨdek sɨkol won olap mɨdɨl, yɨp tepayaŋ nɨgɨnɨgabɨm agup agɨlak. Pen abe anɨb agup, Jɨj anɨb ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, yad Bapi yɨl amebin agup agɨlak.
